methods.javadoc: Invoke this method when the underlying data has changed, but a reload is not required.
methods.name: refresh
methods.comment: Invoke this method when the underlying data has changed, but a reload is not required.

methods.javadoc:
The default implementation of {@link TableModel#getValueAt(int, int)} that calls the 
 abstract {@link #getColumnValueForRow(Object, int)}.
methods.name: getValueAt
methods.comment:
The default implementation of TableModel#getValueAt(int, int) that calls the 
 abstract #getColumnValueForRow(Object, int).

methods.javadoc:
A convenience method to search for the index of a given row object that is visible in the GUI. The visible limitation is due to the fact that the data searched is retrieved from {@link #getModelData()}, which may be filtered.

Note: this operation is O(n). For quick lookups, consider using the sorted version of this class. @param rowObject The object for which to search. @return the index of the item in the data returned by
methods.name: getIndexForRowObject
methods.comment:
A convenience method to search for the index of a given
 row object that is visible in the GUI.  The visible limitation is due to the
 fact that the data searched is retrieved from #getModelData(), which may be 
 filtered.  
 
 Note: this operation is O(n).  For quick lookups, consider using the sorted version 
 of this class.

params.name: rowObject
params.comment: The object for which to search.

return.comment: the index of the item in the data returned by

methods.name: getIndexForRowObject
methods.comment:
Returns the index for the given object in the given list; -1 when the item is not in 
 the list.

methods.javadoc: Call this when the model will no longer be used
methods.name: dispose
methods.comment: Call this when the model will no longer be used
